ARABIC: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُمْ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: who desires to expel you from your land, so what do you recommend?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He wishes to drive you away from the land. So what do you advise?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who seeks to drive you out from your land. What would you have us do?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and said, "He wants to expel you from your land." They asked (others), " what is your opinion in the matter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “He wishes to expel you all from your kingdom; so what do you advise?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He wants to get you out of your land, so what do you advise"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He intends to turn you out of your land. What counsel do you then give?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who desires to expel you from your land; what do you command?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who would expel you from your land. Now what do ye advise?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who seeks to drive you from your land!" Pharaoh said, "What then do you advise?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He would drive you forth from your land; so what is it that ye enjoin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: he seeks to expel you from your land.’ ‘So what do you advise?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: His plan is to get you out of your land: then what is it ye counsel?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He wants to get you out of your land, so what do you advise?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who seeks to drive you from your land what do you command'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “He wants to evict you from your land, so what do you recommend?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who wants to expel you from your land [through magic], so what do you instruct?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:110] who would expel you from your land. So what do you command?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who would expel you from your land) the land of Egypt. (Now what do ye advise?) Pharaoh said to them: "What do you advise that we should do concerning this matter?"
